SELECT user.id, user.userId, user.name, (SELECT COUNT(report.id) FROM report WHERE report.creator=user.userId) as createNum , (SELECT COUNT(report.id) FROM report WHERE report.modifier=user.userId) as modifiNum , (SELECT COUNT(report.id) FROM report WHERE report.modifier=user.userId and report.state = 3) as finishNum, (SELECT COUNT(report.id) FROM report WHERE report.modifier=user.userId and report.state = 3)/(SELECT COUNT(report.id) FROM report WHERE report.modifier=user.userId) as completeRate FROM user,report WHERE user.userId = #{userid} GROUP BY user.id;

SELECT user.id, user.userId, user.name, (SELECT COUNT(report.id) FROM report WHERE report.creator=user.userId and report.state = 2) AS modifiNum, (SELECT COUNT(report.id) FROM report WHERE report.modifier=user.userId ) AS createNum FROM user,report WHERE user.userid = "123" GROUP BY user.id;
SELECT COUNT(IF(user.permission=1,1,null)) as commonNum, COUNT(IF(user.permission=2,1,null)) as manageNum, COUNT(IF(user.permission=3,1,null)) as adminNum FROM user;
SELECT COUNT(IF(report.state=1,1,null)) as createNum, COUNT(IF(report.state=2,1,null)) as modefiNum, COUNT(IF(report.state=3,1,null)) as finishNum FROM report;
